title: Uniform Commercial Code
context: ยง490:2A-530 Lessor&rsquo;s incidental damages. Incidental damages to an aggrieved lessor include any commercially reasonable charges, expenses, or commissions incurred in stopping delivery, in the transportation, care, and custody of goods after the lessee&rsquo;s default, in connection with return or disposition of the goods, or otherwise resulting from the default. [L 1991, c 40, pt of ยง1]
